name: skeletal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of or like a skeleton (= frame of bones): Her body was skeletal (= very thin). He suffered serious skeletal injuries in the accident.
used to describe something that exists in its most basic form: The newspaper report gave only a skeletal account of the debate.
